rule_id.description: The rule's unique ID assigned by Jet.com

rule_name.description: This rule's current name to be set by the partner

merchant_id.description: The partner's unique ID assigned by Jet.com

start_date_time.description:
The starting date and time the rule is scheduled to run

            #Valid Values

            The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on January 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

end_date_time.description:
The ending date and time the rule is scheduled to run

            #Valid Values

            The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on January 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

recurrence.description: If true, this rule will be scheduled to run during according to the speifications provided in the recurrence_type

repeat_type.description:
How the rule is scheduled to repeat

                    #Valid Values

                    * year - the rule will run every year according to the repeat_interval 
                    * month - the rule will run every month according to the repeat_interval 
                    * daily - the rule will run daily according to the repeat_interval

repeat_interval.description: The interval that the variable commission rule should repeat. Values vary based on the repeat_type.

repeat_on.description: The moment that the variable commission rule should run according to the repeat_interval.

variable_commission_type.description:
The type of variable commission or rule being uploaded

            #Valid Values

            * returns - a rule applied to returns that affects variable commission by jet category (browse node).  The 'type_returns' object must be completed for this variable commission type.
            * distance - a rule that applies to a distance that a product will ship to the customer by jet category (browse node).  The 'type_shipping' object must be completed for this variable commission type.
            * email - a rule that pays the customer for giving an email for marketing and promotions.  The 'type_email' object must be completed for this variable commission type.
            * volume - a rule that adjust variable commission and encourages customers to build larger baskets.  The 'type_volume' object must be completed for this variable commission type.

type_email.description: The USD amount to pay a customer for an email to use for marketing and promotions. Only valid if variable_commission_type is email.

category_id.description: The Jet browse node ID that the variable commission or rule is being applied to

adjustment.description: The adjustment to the base commission as a decimal

category_id.description: The Jet browse node ID that the variable commission or rule is being applied to

zone_id.description: The zone number that the variable commission or rule will be set for

adjustment.description: The adjustment to the base commission as a decimal

category_id.description: The Jet browse node ID that the variable commission or rule is being applied to

min_band.description: The lower bound of the pricing band

max_band.description: The upper bound of the pricing band

volume_minimum.description: The minimum number items needed to achieve the discount

adjustment.description: The adjustment to the base commission as a decimal
